en: Measure the height of this tree.

ngiemboon: Á laa fʉ̀ʼʉ mvfò, mé cwóŋo pɔ́ nkwɔ̀ʼ ńdɔgɔ ńgiŋe.
en: Previously, we only wore a thong to walk.
part of a house to the left of the hearth in the kitchen where one arranges things

ngiemboon: À ně ńkẅɛ pɔ́ nkwɔ̀ʼ njÿó ńgʉa né tsẅɛ.
en: He went out at dawn to go to the field.
Here are those returning from the market.
one of eight days of the traditional week
